bike.description: Cr-Mo main frame, internally relieved No Oval Head tube, weld on rotor plate, seat-stay mounted X-wire "U" brake bosses, w/ braze on cable stops, 6mm dropouts, Wrap gusset BB yoke, Tube seat-stay bridge

components.description: Specialized threadless, 1-1/8", reinforced steerer, w/ 1-3/8" blades, 6mm drop-outs, w/ 38mm OD fork adapters
"Dozer" threadless, 1-1/8", oversized lower cup, with SST ORYG 1-1/8 Rotor
Specialized, forged alloy, top load, 55mm reach
Specialized 2-piece, 190mm rise, 640mm width, 8 degree back-sweep, 2 degree up-sweep
Specialized No-flange, Kraton, 140mm
Rush RX4.0, forged, bottom-pull caliper
Tektro SBB-06, u-brake
Tektro SBL-89, u-brake lever pair, 16mm cable pull
Shimano SFMX-30, 1/2" x 1/8", 16T, chrome plated
KMC Z-510, 1/2" x 1/8", w/ Anti-drop inner links, 88 links
Specialized 1-piece, heat treated Hi-Ten, 175mm crank arms
Solid Alloy disc, 44t, 5mm thick, CNC'd center/drive hole and teeth
Specialized , ball-retainer bearing
1/2", Cr-Mo axle, alloy platform, w/ molded pins
Alex X-303, 20", 48h, alloy, single wall, ground side wall, brake surface
Specialized alloy, 48h, 14mm Cr-Mo axle, loose ball
Specialized "Flip Side", alloy, 48h, 14mm Cr-Mo axle, right & left side F/W thread, loose ball
14g UCP, w/brass nipples
Specialized Spanky "Sport", 20 x 2.125" , black skinwall
Specialized Spanky "Sport", 20 x 2.125" , black skinwall
20" x 2.125", schraeder valve
Specialized Jumping, w/8mm rails and X-brace
Alloy micro adjust, 30.9mm/300mm for 8mm rails
Specialized forged alloy, 2-bolt
Specialized alloy fork cap, 38mm O.D. alloy chain tensioners, chainguard cover, reflectors, owners manual
